overview: Kerry Graves is a Private Investigator in Greensboro, NC. He has Master’s Degree in Social Work; Ph.D. candidate in criminal justice (2012). He is a Fully licensed private investigator and Criminologist with a wide variety of skills and experience on domestic, family, and security matters. He has three years experience working as a child welfare investigator, while completing all N.C. state training regarding child abuse and neglect. He is a former clinical instructor in child welfare at UNC-Chapel Hill’s Jordan Institute for Families, and Child Welfare Coordinator at N.C. State University. He served 9 years in the U.S. Army, trained with the Rangers and Special Forces, as well as Blackwater USA, developing a specialty in executive protection.
